        public static java.lang.String formatDateTime(long timeInMillis)
        If the given time is of a different date, display the date. If it is of the same date, display the time.
        Parameters:
        timeInMillis - The time to convert, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        The time or date.

      • hasSameDate

        public static boolean hasSameDate(long millisFirst,
                                  long millisSecond)
        Checks if two dates are of the same day.
        Parameters:
        millisFirst - The time in milliseconds of the first date.
        millisSecond - The time in milliseconds of the second date.
        Returns:
        Whether and are off the same day.
